summary: This document is an email correspondence between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding the confirmation of updated cost basis information on an account at TD Ameritrade. The communication is brief and confirms the successful update of financial information.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the sender of the email, thanking Chad Markland for confirming the update on the account.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is the recipient of the email and is responsible for confirming the update of cost basis information on the account.

keyFacts: The email confirms that the cost basis information on an account at TD Ameritrade has been updated.
Richard Kahn expresses gratitude to Chad Markland for his assistance.
